aboutPageContent: Dadgad brings the excitement of March Madness to your favorite musician’s discography. Whether you’re a lifelong fan or just discovering an artist, our interactive song bracket lets you dive into their catalog in a whole new way.

We automatically rank songs by the artist using a smart blend of popularity, fan favorites, and hidden gems—then it’s your turn. Create your own bracket by selecting head-to-head winners round by round until you crown your ultimate champion.
Once your bracket is complete, generate a shareable image to show off your picks and compare with friends. It’s a fun, personal, and competitive way to celebrate the music you love.
Whether you’re debating the best Kendrick Lamar deep cut or settling a Taylor Swift song showdown, Dadgad lets you play judge in the most fun way possible.
